questions.name: How long does it take to build an online course website?
questions.answer: Typically 4-6 weeks from strategy session to launch. This includes LMS integration, content migration, design, and student experience optimization.

questions.name: Do you work with course creators outside Europe?
questions.answer: We specialize exclusively in European course creators to ensure deep understanding of GDPR, VAT regulations, and regional educational standards.

questions.name: What ROI can I expect?
questions.answer: Most clients see 200-400% increase in course enrollments within 90 days. Our average client increases revenue by 150% within 6 months through improved conversion and retention.

questions.name: Can you integrate with my existing course content?
questions.answer: Yes, we migrate and optimize content from all major platforms including Teachable, Thinkific, Kajabi, and custom solutions.

questions.name: Do you offer student engagement features?
questions.description: Yes, we build community forums, progress tracking, and gamification elements to boost completion rates.

questions.name: What happens after the website launches?
questions.answer: We provide instructor training, ongoing platform optimization, and continuous A/B testing to improve student outcomes.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subheading: Everything you need to know about transforming your course business.

items.question: Can you migrate my existing course content?
items.answer: Yes, we migrate and optimize content from all major platforms while maintaining your branding and structure.

items.question: Do you offer gamification features?
items.answer: Yes, we implement badges, points, leaderboards, and other engagement mechanics proven to boost completion rates.

items.question: Can you create interactive learning activities?
items.answer: Absolutely, we specialize in building quizzes, simulations, and interactive exercises tailored to your subject matter.

items.question: How do you handle student data privacy?
items.answer: We implement GDPR-compliant systems with strict access controls and data protection measures.

items.question: Can you integrate with video hosting platforms?
items.answer: Yes, we integrate with Vimeo, Wistia, YouTube, and other video services for optimal streaming.

items.question: Do you offer certification features?
items.answer: Yes, we build custom certificate generation with verification systems for course completion.
